post:
LevelOneServers is a Colocation, VPS, and Dedicated server provider that strives for quality offerings at a great price.

We also are able to offer a lease-to-own program on servers we have in our office which include Dual X, E5's, and E3's.

Payment Methods Accepted:
Paypal, Credit/Debit Cards, Bitcoin

1U Colocation
1amp @ 120V
10TB Bandwidth on 1Gbps port
DDoS protection and network from Hivelocity.
IPv4 /29 (5 usable IPs) + IPv6 /64
$35/mo
